Key Match Events: Mpasi Nzau became a hero for DR Congo after converting a penalty with a clinical finish to send DR Congo to the quarterfinals.
DR Congo defeated Egypt in a dramatic penalty shootout following a 1-1 tightly contested round of 16 match.
Meschak Elia scored for DR Congo in the 37th minute.
Egypt equalized in the first minute of additional time before the break following a VAR review, resulting in a penalty converted by Mostafa Mohamed.
Both teams missed one penalty each before scoring six consecutive penalty kicks.
Egypt’s keeper Gabaski struck against the crossbar, leading to DR Congo's victory.
